title: Advanced Web Programming Course for Practitioners (LMS-Based)

context.prior_knowledge: HTML/CSS Fundamentals, Basic JavaScript Syntax, Understanding of Backend Development Frameworks
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented curriculum reflecting the work environments of current practitioners, integrated with LMS and real-time collaboration tools

learning_goals: Learners can implement a prototype of an actual corporate homepage using HTML5/CSS3 responsive web templates provided by the LMS.
Completion of a dynamic web application development and deployment project by integrating JavaScript (ES6+) and RESTful APIs.

Learners integrate LMS collaboration tools (e.g., Slack, Trello) with GitHub to develop three functional modules with three team members, submitting project deliverables within a week that meet the following criteria: 1) 15+ Git commits, 2) 5+ issue tracker uses, 3) 2+ code reviews conducted
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
